thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 693
thread.title: Steve
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: I loved the service, Redspot offers top quality happy professionals, much better than Europcar who twice claimed I scratched their already scratched car. However, the Kia Rio I got had power issues at high speeds, but it's the car, not Redspot. For long journeys, i advise you get a bigger car that feels steady on the motorway when overtaking trucks.
